title: Veteran Macro Investor Dan Tapiero’s Take on Gold and Bitcoin
description: In a recent episode of The Breakdown podcast, host Nathaniel Whittemore interviewed Dan Tapiero, co-founder of 10T Holdings and a well-known figure in the investment world. Tapiero, with his extensive experience in macro investing and deep understanding of the global financial system, shared his insights on a range of topics, from the enduring value of […]

title: AAVE spikes 27%, whale accumulating ahead of GHO stablecoin mainnet launch
description: AAVE, the native governance token of Aave, a decentralized, multichain, and non-custodial lending and borrowing protocol, is up 27% as of June 25

title: Analyst: Climbing Above $0.5025 Could Push XRP to Higher Levels
description:
Ripple (XRP) is set for a significant rally that will trigger if it wins the ongoing case against the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). According to Michael van de Poppe, founder of MN Trading, climbing above $0.5025 would trigger XRP’s movement toward higher price levels. Many crypto users, including respondents under Van de Poppe’s tweet, […]
